channel.title: NRS3server 667 loading 711 development [RELEASED]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2466li9.gif[/img] Hi guys its me TimeBroken im finally back and im currently working on an all new server this will be by far an exceptional server and ill appreciate all the support i get for this At the moment we are currently just starting out fixed a couple of the bugs and lots more still needed to complete so dw this wont be a leech once its completed.
Here are some features
[size=14pt][b][u]Recent Updates:[/u][/b][/size] Finished PACKING zammy and arma not done hp Fixed trading Fixed Castle Wars 100% Clan wars Soul Wars is now in construction 40% Dominion Tower Complete partially
[size=12pt][u][b]Features:[/b][/u][/size] - Switching is near perfect - All Spellbooks are accessible via Commands and altars - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP - Auras are all complete except for Salvation and Corruption bonuses work wings are glitched
(Bosses) - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - 85% Godwars - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows{prizes glitchy still} & More...
Pvp/PK/PVM/Combat - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)
Random Stuff: - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - music everyone knows that - custom maps - donorzones staffzones and more
Armours/Bosses: - All new 711 armours obv we all know - Bosses are upgraded to new looks - Jad waves maxed out to 65 - Armours are almost all update to date with bonuses and stats - Each armour that need requirements on RS is same on here now - Quests are partially made
Home/Shops [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/30l29p4.png[/img] SkillCape shop is now corresponding with the skills you have acheived [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2u5z9g1.png[/img] Armours are almost all up to date with bonuses [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/9zlopx.png[/img] Grand Exchange is now Working still a few bugs but works well and all items almost added [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/fnqy6w.png[/img]
[u][b]V2 Updates[/b][/u] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/ulhfm.png[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/353cizk.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/351buwp.png[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/5vdco0.png[/img] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/14x1ox0.png[/img]
[u][b]V2.1 Small fixes & New Stuff[/b][/u] [b]Crystal to save your game in locations and teleporting[/b] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ldatzr.png[/img] [b]duel arena with proper interfaces[/b] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2itjukh.png[/img] [b]PolyPore Working 100%[/b] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/fu7yj4.png[/img] [b]Dominion Tower with all modes[/b] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/207lug7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2zz01v9.png[/img] [b]Glacors[/b] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/muzwcz.jpg[/img] [b]Jadinko's[/b] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/348mw5y.png[/img] [b]New Player logg interfaces[/b] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/72u4hx.png[/img] [b]Gnome Agility Course[/b] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/20uub9c.png[/img]
[b]Final Update Just dicing[/b] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/1ex7k9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/9i5ogw.png[/img]
Currently in Development with me TimeBroken *me (Server/Forum Developer) Neroxx (Server Developer) Alexis (Server Developer) GhostX (Client Developer) Destiny (GFX Designer)
Grand exchange was taken out due to being extremely laggy and to many bugs [/center]

item.title: NRS3server 667 loading 711 development [RELEASED]
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

[quote=“Pvp 508, post:25, topic:441083”]

30l29p4.png898×445

Your npc faces diagonally why’s that? I mean all of them…?

  • King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects
  • Tormented Demons with all 3 switches
  • Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless)
  • 85% Godwars
  • Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks
  • Frost dragons
  • Dominion Tower
  • Barrows{prizes glitchy still} & More…

Pvp/PK/PVM/Combat

  • Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless <---------- No it isn’t Matrix combat or dementhium or whatever you’re using is not even close to 99.9% and it’s not flawless.
  • Switching better than RS <------------ No it isn’t why improve something that didn’t need to be improved at all?
  • Full Summoning!! <--------- You don’t have full summoning. Do you even realize how much efforts you’d have to put into full summoning? Just because you have pouch creation and npcs spawning / following doesn’t mean you have Full summoning there’s so much more then that.

Finished PACKING zammy and arma not done hp
Fixed trading <---- Tutorial was released earlier by Demon Dylan which was horrible lol
Fixed Castle Wars 100% <----- Not even close to 100% so you’re telling me you have the working score board outside of the cw’s arena? Do you have working catapults?
Clan wars
Soul Wars is now in construction 40% <-------------------- Not even close to 40% Please stop posting percentages of stuff when you’re wy off.
Dominion Tower Complete partially <-------------- …[/quote]

plz do not post that my precentages are off if you have not even played server to see what i have done and yes i do have score boards set outside cw and catapults work to

so your saying theres no way i could improve what matrix didnt improve themself are you trying to say i have no potential to fix server up ?

i fixed trade without using the tut so idk what your talking about on that

Mind telling me your perspective of perfect summoning cause in pretty sure if you have all specs correct stats all pets following and all that is basically what a person looks for in RSPS

Obviously not better switching then RS its called exagerating to draw attention I don’t see no one else complaining just for you I’ll change it

Dude I am no hardcore java expert ok this is an RSPS something’s are not there big woop obv we will not make the perfect RSPS so yeh

Read full topic
